document_data.name: Sticky Dondo
document_data.mainbody:
'''Sticky Dondo''' was a [[thief]] and fence member of [[Fetcher's Brats]] and later [[the Guild]] in the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
{{quote|''Sometimes stuff we sell comes back around to us again. So watch yourself. Got me?''|Sticky Dondo}}
document_data.Description: Dondo was a young [[human]] boy with a tan skin tone, light brown eyes, and strawberry blonde hair. He wore a garb dyed with the Guild's green color and had a direct and straight-to-business demeanor.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Sticky Dondo was a part of a street urchin gang led by [[Osgur Hallorn|Osgur "Fetcher" Hallorn]]. When the man disappeared following a guild war breaking out between [[Nine-Fingers Keene]] and the [[Stone Lord]], Fetcher's Brats were taken in by the Guild and given shelter in the Guildhall. Sticky Dondo took on the role of leader among the kids, fencing stolen and looted goods to the members of the Guild, and [[Li'l Fezmor]] kept herself busy, sending clients to Sticky, and masterminding heists.
